process.name: Synchronization - Roles from LDAP
process.documentation:
Workflow for synchronization of groups from LDAP.
Input variables: - uid (String), - entityType (enum SystemEntityType), + icAttributes (List of IcAttribute), - syncConfigId (UUID for SysSyncConfig), - actionType (String) - situation(String), + accountId(UUID), + entityId(UUID)

scriptTask.name: Missing entity
Linked
Resolve catalogue
Set automatic role by attributes
Set automatic role by org structure
Set attributes
Unlinked
Create automatic roles and catalog
Create automatic roles and catalog
Create item log
